name: Quick Pan-Seared Scallops
author: RACH7H
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add shallot; cook and stir until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes
Pour in lemon juice and cook until evaporated, scraping the bottom of the skillet with a wooden spoon to release any browned bits, about 3 minutes
Place scallops 1/2 inch apart in the skillet
Cook until browned on the bottom, about 1 minute
Flip and continue cooking until the second side is deeply browned, about 1 minute more
Transfer scallops to a serving plate; season with salt and pepper
